headline: BRK.B Trading at a Discount to 52-Week High: What Should Investors Do?
summary: Berkshire Hathaway trades 8.9% below its 52-week high, but premium valuation, soft returns on capital and muted earnings outlook raise caution for investors.

raw.headline: BRK.B Trading at a Discount to 52-Week High: What Should Investors Do?
raw.summary: Berkshire Hathaway trades 8.9% below its 52-week high, but premium valuation, soft returns on capital and muted earnings outlook raise caution for investors.

headline: Chubb Limited Board Will Recommend 33rd Consecutive Annual Dividend Increase to Shareholders at the 2026 Annual General Meeting; Declares Quarterly Dividend
summary: Chubb Limited (NYSE: CB) announced today that its Board of Directors will recommend to shareholders at the company's 2026 Annual General Meeting an increase in its quarterly dividend for the 33rd consecutive year. The proposal calls for a $4.08 annual per share dividend, payable in four quarterly installments of $1.02 per share, compared to the current quarterly dividend amount of $0.97 per share.

The proposal calls for a $4.08 annual per share dividend, payable in four quarterly installments of $1.02 per share, compared to the current quarterly dividend amount of $0.97 per share.

headline: State Farm announces $5 billion dividend; $100 average refund coming to car insurance customers
summary: Customers can expect to receive $100 refund on average, though State Farm says it will vary by state and by the amount of premium paid.

raw.headline: State Farm announces $5 billion dividend; $100 average refund coming to car insurance customers
